display_long_description:
Dash Runner VR turns natural head movement into a fast-paced, low-impact VR fitness runner where motion drives every run.

Players dash to avoid incoming obstacle blocks red and orange, and collect coins as rewards as speed and intensity increase. 

Smooth mechanics, responsive feedback, and short, repeatable runs make Dash Runner VR ideal for both quick workouts and extended play sessions just use your smart watch to monitor your workout. 

Whether you’re chasing high scores or exploring a fun, accessible way to stay active in VR, every run challenges your reflexes, focus, and endurance.

Key Features are 
Head-Driven Gameplay – Jump and dodge using subtle, natural head movements while facing forward

Dynamic Shield Tracking – A protective shield follows the headset position in real time

Controller Haptics – Tactile feedback enhances impacts when players hit obstacles. 

Low-Impact Fitness Design – Encourages movement without requiring exaggerated physical effort

Pause Anytime – Press Y on the left controller to pause gameplay

Orientation Re-Centering – Perform the ∞ (infinity) hand sign to realign orientation at any time and make sure you are position not too close behind the shield 

Room-Scale Safety Awareness – Gameplay encourages players to remain centered within their boundary which is 90 in × 90 in 

Short, Repeatable Runs – Ideal for quick sessions or longer fitness-focused play
